description:
This course is about making your marketing for your business a lot easier than you may have thought. The course consists of 9 video lectures split up into 4 different sections and will take just under an hour to complete the course.

Section 1 deals with the reasons why niche marketing is important. Section 2 i look at the financial and profitability side of finding a niche market. Section 3 i show how to locate markets in the minimum amount of time both offline and online. Section 4 i summarize what i covered in the course.

The sections are structured in a way making it easy to follow at your pace and absorb the information in the lectures.

The goal of taking this course is to show that knowing how to uncover niche markets is an essential and great skill to have and how you can put it to practical use to improve your business.
title: Niche Marketing Made Easy
